data.text: @_TeoCJ @Khairykj what most Singaporeans like me like to do is to be able to spend a long weekend in Malaysia. The testing requirements set out make it not viable to do so. https://t.co/3QJUHaEtNL
@_TeoCJ @tg_rhu You can go malaysia freely with vtl and non vtl. Unless u no money to do the pcr test and all. 😉
@ChannelNewsAsia @mirulzki Surely its not April's fool prank 🤭
@ChannelNewsAsia By car ? Dream on ..... Unlikely to implement that soon , by Air only for May . Anyway local PCR departure test $96 to $110 ..... Siow ah mana wu eng ????

@ChannelNewsAsia To prevent any risk of spike in infections, we should wait till after the June holidays before proceeding. Also, it seems that Malaysia is the one leading us on when to close or open.
